scripts.build: npm run copy && unocss "templates/**/*.html" -o sass/_uno.scss && zola build
scripts.copy: cp node_modules/@unocss/reset/tailwind.css sass/_tailwind.scss && cp node_modules/@docsearch/css/dist/style.css sass/_docsearch.scss && cp node_modules/@docsearch/js/dist/umd/index.js static/docsearch.js && cp node_modules/@docsearch/js/dist/umd/index.js.map static/docsearch.js.map
